author: Joe Jarosak
content: I've always been a fan of prime lenses.  When I first started using a 35mm camera in the 70's zoom lenses were not all that great for image quality.   They are much better today but I've always gravitated back to primes. My all time favorite lens for my 5DMKII is my Zeiss Distagon 35mm, I don't even mind the manual focus.   My next lens for my GX1 is going to be the Oly 45.
